com.nspu.riotapi

Class RiotApi

  • com.nspu.riotapi.RiotApi

  • public class RiotApi

    Creates and configures a REST adapter for Riot API.

    Basic usage: RiotApi riotApi = new RiotApi(endPoint, accessToken);

    Create instance of RiotApi with given executors.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  RiotApi.AddHeaderTokenInterceptor
      The request interceptor that will add the header with OAuth token to every request made with the wrapper.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RiotApi(java.util.concurrent.Executor callbackExecutor, java.lang.String endPoint, java.lang.String accessToken)
      thread that created the instances.
      RiotApi(java.lang.String endPoint, java.lang.String accessToken)
      New instance of RiotApi, with single thread executor both for http and callbacks.

        accessToken - settings access token
